name: Try to live
description:
Rate here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/try-to-live

If you died, refresh page to restart the game.

It’s a tiny idle game.

This is the first time I used Unity and Aseprite to join Ludum Dare.
I’m still not familiar with these software, so I know there are many things can improve.
My goal is just finish LD44 compo this time, and I hope I can to better next time.

Thanks for playing my game.
